parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide for Medical Devices (SDTMIG-MD) Version 1.1

datasetStructure: One record per recorded intervention occurrence or constant treatment interval per subject

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide for Medical Devices (SDTMIG-MD) Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DX.STUDYID

datasetVariables.description: Unique identifier for a study.
datasetVariables.label: Study Identifier
datasetVariables.name: STUDYID

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide for Medical Devices (SDTMIG-MD) Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DX.DOMAIN

datasetVariables.description: Two-character abbreviation for the domain.
datasetVariables.label: Domain Abbreviation
datasetVariables.name: DOMAIN

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide for Medical Devices (SDTMIG-MD) Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DX.USUBJID

datasetVariables.description: Identifier used to uniquely identify a subject across all studies for all applications or submissions involving the product.
datasetVariables.label: Unique Subject Identifier
datasetVariables.name: USUBJID

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide for Medical Devices (SDTMIG-MD) Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DX.SPDEVID

datasetVariables.description: Sponsor-defined identifier for the device. It must be unique for each tracked unit of the device under study, and can be at whatever level of granularity the device should be identified (e.g., model or serial number, or combination of identifiers).
datasetVariables.label: Sponsor Device Identifier
datasetVariables.name: SPDEVID

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide for Medical Devices (SDTMIG-MD) Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DX.DXSEQ

datasetVariables.description: Sequence Number given to ensure uniqueness of device records within subject records within a domain. May be any valid number. It should be unique within every subject/device combination.
datasetVariables.label: Sequence Number
datasetVariables.name: DXSEQ

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide for Medical Devices (SDTMIG-MD) Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DX.DXGRPID

datasetVariables.description: Identifier that ties together a block of related records in a single domain for a subject. For example, if a device is inserted that delivers radiation, DXGRPID could be used to tie the records for the device and the radiation together for each course of therapy.
datasetVariables.label: Group ID
datasetVariables.name: DXGRPID

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide for Medical Devices (SDTMIG-MD) Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DX.DXSPID

datasetVariables.description: Sponsor-defined reference number. Examples: a number pre-printed on the CRF as an explicit line identifier or record identifier defined in the sponsor's operational database.
datasetVariables.label: Sponsor-Defined Identifier
datasetVariables.name: DXSPID

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide for Medical Devices (SDTMIG-MD) Version 1.1

priorVersion.title: Name of Device Exposure or Output

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DX.DXTRT

self.title: Name of Device Exposure or Output

datasetVariables.description: Name of the device or the exposure outputs that are delivered or administered via the device. This should match the definitions as described in the trial summary domain and/or the protocol. Example: "coronary stent", "extracorporeal shock wave treatment", "hyaluronic acid".
datasetVariables.label: Name of Device Exposure or Output
datasetVariables.name: DXTRT

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide for Medical Devices (SDTMIG-MD) Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DX.DXCAT

datasetVariables.description: Used to define a category of device exposures. For example, for a subject who had radiation delivered through an implanted catheter, DXCAT could be used to group the radiation records versus the catheter records.
datasetVariables.label: Category for Device Exposure
datasetVariables.name: DXCAT

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide for Medical Devices (SDTMIG-MD) Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DX.DXSCAT

datasetVariables.description: A further categorization of device exposures. If DXCAT captures the radiation versus catheter records (see DXCAT), then DXSCAT might capture the type of catheter if more than one was used.
datasetVariables.label: Subcategory for Device Exposure
datasetVariables.name: DXSCAT

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide for Medical Devices (SDTMIG-MD) Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DX.DXDOSE

datasetVariables.description: Amount of DXTRT administered/delivered per administration. Dose if captured as a numeric value. Dose should only appear once in DXDOSE, DXDOSTXT, or DXDOSTOT.
datasetVariables.label: Exposure per Administration
datasetVariables.name: DXDOSE

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide for Medical Devices (SDTMIG-MD) Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DX.DXDOSTXT

datasetVariables.description: Exposure amount or a range of exposure information collected in text form. Units may be stored in DXDOSU. Example: 200-400, 15-20. Dose should only appear once in DXDOSE, DXDOSTXT, or DXDOSTOT.
datasetVariables.label: Device Exposure Description
datasetVariables.name: DXDOSTXT

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C71620

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide for Medical Devices (SDTMIG-MD) Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DX.DXDOSU

datasetVariables.description: Units for DXDOSE, DXDOSTXT, and DXDOSTOT. Examples: "pulses", "ml".
datasetVariables.label: Device Exposure Units
datasetVariables.name: DXDOSU

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C71113

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide for Medical Devices (SDTMIG-MD) Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DX.DXDOSFRQ

datasetVariables.description: Exposure frequency per interval. Usually expressed as the number of repeated administrations of DXDOSE within a specific time period. Examples: "CONTINUOUS", "PRN", "Q2M" (every 2 months).
datasetVariables.label: Device Exposure Frequency per Interval
datasetVariables.name: DXDOSFRQ

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide for Medical Devices (SDTMIG-MD) Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DX.DXDOSTOT

datasetVariables.description: Total daily exposure of DXTRT using the units in DXDOSU. Total exposure over a period other than day could be recorded in a separate Supplemental Qualifier variable.
datasetVariables.label: Total Daily Device Exposure
datasetVariables.name: DXDOSTOT

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide for Medical Devices (SDTMIG-MD) Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DX.DXDOSRGM

datasetVariables.description: Text description of the (intended) schedule or regimen for the Intervention. Examples: "TWO WEEKS ON, TWO WEEKS OFF".
datasetVariables.label: Intended Device Exposure Regimen
datasetVariables.name: DXDOSRGM

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C66729

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide for Medical Devices (SDTMIG-MD) Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DX.DXROUTE

datasetVariables.description: Route of administration for DXTRT. Examples: "EXTRACORPOREAL", "INTRA-ARTICULAR, HEMODIALYSIS".
datasetVariables.label: Route of Administration
datasetVariables.name: DXROUTE

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide for Medical Devices (SDTMIG-MD) Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DX.DXLOC

datasetVariables.description: Anatomic location of exposure. Examples: "Knee", "Eye".
datasetVariables.label: Location of Device Exposure
datasetVariables.name: DXLOC

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide for Medical Devices (SDTMIG-MD) Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DX.DXLAT

datasetVariables.description: Qualifier for anatomical location further detailing laterality. Examples: "RIGHT", "LEFT", "BILATERAL".
datasetVariables.label: Laterality of Device Exposure
datasetVariables.name: DXLAT

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide for Medical Devices (SDTMIG-MD) Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DX.DXADJ

datasetVariables.description: Describes reason why the exposure was adjusted from protocol-specified or expected exposure levels. Example: "PAIN".
datasetVariables.label: Reason for Exposure Adjustment
datasetVariables.name: DXADJ

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide for Medical Devices (SDTMIG-MD) Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DX.DXSTDTC

datasetVariables.description: Start date and time of exposure. Defined by the sponsor.
datasetVariables.label: Start Date/Time of Device Exposure
datasetVariables.name: DXSTDTC

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide for Medical Devices (SDTMIG-MD) Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DX.DXENDTC

datasetVariables.description: End date and time of exposure. Defined by the sponsor.
datasetVariables.label: End Date/Time of Device Exposure
datasetVariables.name: DXENDTC

modelClassVariable.title: Study Day of Start of Observation

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide for Medical Devices (SDTMIG-MD) Version 1.1

priorVersion.title: Study Day of Start of Device Exposure

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DX.DXSTDY

self.title: Study Day of Start of Device Exposure

datasetVariables.description: Study day of start of exposure relative to the sponsor-defined RFSTDTC.
datasetVariables.label: Study Day of Start of Device Exposure
datasetVariables.name: DXSTDY

modelClassVariable.title: Study Day of End of Observation

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide for Medical Devices (SDTMIG-MD) Version 1.1

priorVersion.title: Study Day of End of Device Exposure

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DX.DXENDY

self.title: Study Day of End of Device Exposure

datasetVariables.description: Study day of end of exposure relative to the sponsor-defined RFSTDTC.
datasetVariables.label: Study Day of End of Device Exposure
datasetVariables.name: DXENDY

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide for Medical Devices (SDTMIG-MD) Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DX.DXDUR

datasetVariables.description: Collected duration for a treatment episode. Used only if collected on the CRF and not derived from start and end date/times.
datasetVariables.label: Duration of Device Exposure
datasetVariables.name: DXDUR

description: An interventions domain that contains a subject's exposure to a medical device under study. (Source: CDISC Controlled Terminology, DOMAIN, C102617, 2018-06-29)
label: Device Exposure
name: DX
